import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import CheckoutItem from '../../components/checkout-item/CheckoutItem' import StripeButton from '../../components/stripe-button/StripeButton' import StripeCheckout from '../../components/stripe-checkout-form/StripeCheckout' import { selectCartItems, selectCartTotal } from '../../redux/cart/cartSelectors' import './checkoutStyle.scss' const CheckoutComponent = () => { const cartItems = useSelector(selectCartItems) const total = useSelector(selectCartTotal) return (
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{ cartItems.map(cartItem => ) }
TOTAL: ${total}
) } export default CheckoutComponent
